title: Gold Player Looking For A Team
body: Hello There! I am looking for a ranked 5 team that is serious! I Main Top And Jungle. Have Some prior team experience but left as they weren't as serious as i had thought.

replies.body:
Hey mate,

Two friends and I have been searching for 2 more players to make a ranked team together.

Mid - Satsii
ADC - peemac
Sup - me (DaVone)

Happy to include you should you still be looking :), we're always looking to improve our play and we're on most nights too.

Cheers.

Me too, looking for a serius team, i can play everyday and im main jungler or suport, but i can play also adc.
My nickname "cordellat" add me and lets make some plays.
